Colors¶

The color property hold the colors used for the point cloud.

Color Property¶

class ColorProperty.ColorProperty(points, rgb=None)[source]¶

Attributes

_ColorProperty__rgb

Methods

_BaseProperty__getPointProperty(idx) Retrieve the point property (object or value) of a specific point
getValues() Get a specific characteristic value of the property
load([colors]) Set :param colors: :param kwargs: :return:
RGB¶

Points’ colors, ranging 0-255 (integers)

Returns: rgb
Return type: int, nx3 numpy.array
getValues()[source]¶

Get a specific characteristic value of the property

Returns: value for each point
Return type: np.array

Warning

This function needs to be overwritten for each inheriting property. It is empty at the BaseProperty

load(colors=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Set :param colors: :param kwargs: :return:

rgb¶

Points’ colors, ranging 0-1 (floats)

Returns: rgb
Return type: float, nx3 numpy.array

Color Factory¶

class ColorFactory.ColorFactory[source]¶

Color a PointSet using different methods

Methods

ProjectImages(points, images, matrices) Project images onto a points set (giving each point a color)
assignColor(points, colors) Assigns color to PointSet
static ProjectImages(points, images, matrices)[source]¶

Project images onto a points set (giving each point a color)

Parameters:
  • points – The point cloud to color
  • images – The images to project
  • matrices –

    Camera matrices

    type points: PointSet.PointSet
    type images: list of nd-array
    param matrices: list of 3x4 nd-array
Returns:

Each point’s color is taken from the appropriate image
Return type:

ColorProperty

static assignColor(points, colors)[source]¶

Assigns color to PointSet

Parameters:
  • points (PointSet) – The PointSet to which the color is added
  • colors (np.array) – The colors added
Returns:

the color property of the PointSet
Return type:

ColorProperty

Color utilities¶

RandomColors choose colors such that they are farthest from each other as possible.
